autoFocus.description:
Whether to automatically set focus on the first focusable
content within the popover when opened.

closeOnEsc.description: Whether to close the popover when the escape key is pressed.

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the popover when the user clicks outside of the popover.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  anchor: string
  trigger: string
  content: string
  title: string
  description: string
  closeTrigger: string
  positioner: string
  arrow: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the popover. Useful for composition.

initialFocusEl.description: The element to focus on when the popover is opened.

modal.description:
Whether the popover should be modal. When set to `true`:
- interaction with outside elements will be disabled
- only popover content will be visible to screen readers
- scrolling is blocked
- focus is trapped within the popover

onEscapeKeyDown.description: Function called when the escape key is pressed

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the combobox

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the combobox

onOpenChange.description: Function invoked when the popover opens or closes

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the combobox

portalled.description: Whether the popover is rendered in a portal

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the popover content

lazyMount.description: Whether to enable lazy mounting. Defaults to `false`.

unmountOnExit.description: Whether to unmount on exit. Defaults to `false`.
